Patent Information.Patent Title: Immunogenic Peptides Derived from the Midkine Protein, as an Anticancer Vaccine.
Patent Information.Abstract: A peptide derived from the Midkine protein, comprising at least one CD4+ T or CD8+ T epitope restricted by the HLA molecules predominant in the Caucasian population, or a polynucleotide encoding said peptide, as an anticancer vaccine or as a reagent for immunomonitoring of the cellular response against Midkine over the course of a cancer or of an anticancer treatment.
